DOC.brief_title: S9925 : Collecting Storing Samples From Patients With Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Establish central lung cancer specimen repository serve resource current future scientific study . - Correlate clinicopathologic information Southwest Oncology Group clinical data base result study use repository . - Test new hypothesis specimens repository . OUTLINE : Peripheral blood , sputum , biopsy specimen collect patient . Tissue sample frozen store lung cancer specimen repository later use correlative study . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Not specify
